name: Stinger
Lore: 'Constructed by a secretive Surronian hive craftguild. Equipped with H2-1 hyperdrive system and emergency braking jets. Guri''s personal starship. Gift from Prince Xizor.',
Text: 'Permanent pilot provides 1 ability. May add Guri as pilot (suspends permanent pilot). Guri deploys aboard for free. When Guri piloting, adds one battle destiny and immune to attrition < 5.',
